long_description: This guide gives you all the beta and covers all the major areas from San Diego to Santa Barbara. Author: Troy Mayr. Softcover; 338 pages; black-and-white photos; route maps. K. Daniels and Associates; copyright 2004. Areas covered: Williamson Rock, New Jack City, Echo Cliffs, Keller Peak, Devils Punchbowl. Holcomb Valley. Big Rock, Frustration Creek, Makibu Creek, Santa Barbara, Texas Canyon, Mission Gorge. Poway Crags, Apple Valley and Point Dume.
short_description: This guide gives you all the beta and covers all the major areas from San Diego to Santa Barbara.
